main event: A UFO was observed in the Canal Zone, Panama on 19 December 1957, with the observation lasting 7 to 8 seconds.
interesting points: The object was detected via ground radar,The source of the observation was civilian,The sighting was concluded to likely be that of a meteor,Only one object was observed, The observation took place at GMT 20/03352.
witness description: source was civilian; details not provided on individual witnesses
